revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Iapapa |image = [[File:Iapapa.png]] |caption = This Berry is very big and sour. The juiciness of the pulp accuentuates sourness. |growtime = 6m 20s |harvest = 18 berries |replant = 30% |points = 60 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *15 sour }} '''Iapapa''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of sour and less than 5 points of all other flavours. The [[Aspear]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 secs || 3 mins 20 secs || 3 mins 50 secs || 6 mins 20 secs - 12 mins 40 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:IapapaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:IapapaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:IapapaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Iapapa berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
